Home.name: Santiago Spencer D.
Home.subtitle: Web and mobile developer with backend knowledge
Home.information: I am a developer with a solid track record with over 4 years of experience in the software industry, specializing in languages like Javascript, Typescript, and libraries like React and React-native. My passion for developing clean code and scalable architecture has driven me to collaborate on the innovation of projects and provide solutions that not only meet but exceed my clients' objectives.

Experience.title: Experience
Experience.subtitle: Years of experience in the software industry

items.description: Advances in the same development from 2022 but with another company, applying new knowledge to the POS application in React Native, which improved transaction processing by 20%, increasing operational efficiency. I implemented custom components that reduced development time by 30%, allowing for simple logic in views and implementing custom hooks in each view to store complex logic.

I supported an innovative company related to sports in improving their web platform, which was developed in React for the frontend and NestJs for the backend. The platform has a subscription system where people can subscribe through PayPal. An innovative way of imposing commercials on their videos within the platform was also implemented.

I supported the development of a POS application for a major pharmaceutical company in the country, using React Native and Redux, improving customer experience and operational efficiency. I played a key role in the strategy and execution of mobile solutions, applying concepts of custom hooks and separated components using DRY methodology. I also supported a major project for one of the most important universities in Chile with cutting-edge technologies like GraphQL and NestJS. I contributed to product stability by proactively identifying and solving complex problems, optimizing the performance of existing applications.

I consistently achieved strategic objectives, contributing to the technical and operational direction of the team. I facilitated the adoption of best practices in software development using technologies like ReactJS Typescript and React Native, and security practices including obfuscation and API-Rest integration with advanced cryptography, strengthening the security and reliability of mobile banking solutions. I guided and trained new developers, fostering a continuous learning environment.
